attributes.action: make the BBC withdraw our financial support, and uk entry and coverage to the eurovison song contest
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Over the last few years it has become increasingly obvious that this is no longer a music contest but a political platform to insult and ostracize the UK.  We are no longer prepared to put up with this humilating propaganda, lets see how long this contest lasts without UK funding.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
